ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: By the sun and its morning brightness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I CALL TO witness the sun and his early morning splendour,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: By the sun and its heat and brightness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: By the sun and its noon-time brightness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: By oath of the sun and its light
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I swear by the sun and its brilliance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: By the sun and his morning brightness
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: By the sun and his brightness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: By the sun and its rising brightness
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the sun and his morning bright-ness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: By the sun and her forenoon splendour,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By the Sun and his (glorious) splendour;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the sun and its brightness;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: By the sun and its midmorning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: By the sun and its radiance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: By the sun and its brightness
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [91:1] By the sun and her morning light,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (By the sun and his brightness): '(By the sun and his brightness) Allah swears by the sun and its light,
